title: Add “BRUTAL” app name text to sign-in page

requirements.summary: Display the app name “BRUTAL” prominently on the sign-in page without changing other sign-in content or any onboarding/sign-up pages.
acceptanceCriteria: The sign-in page visibly shows the app name "BRUTAL" as text (not only as image alt text).

All existing sign-in page sections (logo area, headline/tagline, continue button, feature cards, footer) remain present and functionally unchanged aside from the minimal spacing needed to add the app name.
No changes are made to onboarding/sign-up flow pages or their UI.

file_operations.description: Insert a new prominent, on-brand text heading "BRUTAL" near the existing logo/title area on the sign-in page, adjusting only minimal spacing/typography as needed to accommodate the new text while leaving all other existing sections and behavior unchanged.
